value:
My king followed a path he believed
was just. Why he saw fit to choose
that particular method, however...

We as Plegians acknowledged the
exalt's sacrifice. My heart wept but I
was duty-bound to carry onward...

When combat lulls, my thoughts turn
toward my wife and son... I pray they
remain in good health and spirits.

Heed my guidance: on the battlefield,
you mustn't entertain doubt, for
hesitation will lead to your downfall.

If a soldier is not prepared to fight at
a moment's notice during peacetime,
then all their training was for naught.

I am General Mustafa of Plegia.
I come as an emissary of
$Nf.

Here stands General Mustafa of
Plegia! If you wish to keep your
lives, then you must win them!

This is my strength. This is my pride!
Who amongst you dares to stand in
my way?

For as long as my lungs breathe and
my muscles move, I will fight!

You would entrust this to me? Thank
you. I will see it put to proper use on
the battlefield.

I am General Mustafa of Plegia.
Other than fighting I'm not good
for much, but my strength is yours.

Your command has been remarkable.
I say this being a veteran of countless
wartime campaigns.$k$pSoldiers must obey their leader, of
course, but imagine their relief when
they receive competent orders...$k$pYou clearly understand that solid
leadership is instrumental in keeping
up morale, $Nu.$k$pShould you ever lose sight of that or
your humanity, your forces will
crumble in an instant.$k$pTreat your soldiers with respect,
and we will fight to the ends of
the earth for you...my word on it.
たあっ
潰す！
ぐっ…
見事だ…
I will handle this!
This time, I will prevail!
Prove your worth!
A dignified end!
Stay brave, lads.
ふん…
I am General Mustafa of Plegia. Let us join forces.
*belly laugh* If you want a rise out of me, you'll have to try harder than that.
Let us avoid senseless slaughter. If you lay down your weapon, I will lower mine.
I'm fond of Henry. The lad reminds me of my son.
I would have rather not fought Prince Chrom—but it was unavoidable.
So these are the seeds of peace that you have sown, Emmeryn...
In this conflict, I find myself on your side. I take great pleasure in that.
Understood.
Hmm.
Coming through!
